V.ii.3.D.4.j
.
Granting P&T without DEA
When a P&T evaluation is established, if eligibility for DEA is not being established as an ancillary benefit in the same rating decision (for example, when eligibility for DEA has been granted in a prior decision or is not warranted for a grant of benefits under
38 U.S.C. 1151
), modify the rating narrative text to provide a discussion of only the permanence determination unless a decision is specifically required for DEA.
